question:
Assume that the table below is delivered to you as a CSV file. Which of the potential solutions would load the data into a DataFrame object where the index is set to the month column?


tickets_monthly.csv
```
   month  opened  resolved  rejected  people_involved
    Jan    1098       776        81               12
    Feb    1266       910        78               13
    Mar    1419       954       126               12
    Apr    1229       829        89               13
    May    1106       811        74               13
    Jun    1166       859        50               12
    Jul    1132       864        80               13
    Aug    1083       726        99               12
    Sep    1018       761        43               10
    Oct    1434       964       155               13
    Nov    1283       935       101                9
    Dec    1335       978        80               14
```
